name: figma-to-tailwind
description: Figma Layers to Tailwind HTML/JSX (utilizing JIT and custom configs)

scripts.build: yarn run build:ui && yarn run build:main
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "yarn run build:main -- --watch" "yarn run build:ui -- --watch"
scripts.tsc: yarn run tsc:main && yarn run tsc:ui
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "yarn run tsc:main -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:ui -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
